contents.text: Welcome to Sentry in San Francisco, where we help developers monitor and fix crashes in real time.
To speak with our sales team for new accounts and product information, press 1.
For product information and feature overview, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for product information.

navigationGoals: I want a quick overview of Sentry’s features to see if it’s right for my team.
I’m a veteran transitioning into software development and would like an overview of Sentry’s crash monitoring features to see if it meets my needs.
I'd like a technical walkthrough of Sentry's latest performance monitoring features for our JavaScript SDK.
Can someone explain how your product features work for a new user?
Discuss creating a new Sentry account and understanding its crash-monitoring features for my physics research project.

contents.text: For pricing, plans, and licensing details, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing and licensing.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing and licensing information to finalize our budget.
I’m a veteran founder and need to review Sentry’s pricing plans, licensing tiers, and any available discounts for vets.
I need detailed information on enterprise pricing tiers and the seat-based licensing model.
I need help understanding subscription costs and licensing terms.
Get details on Sentry’s subscription tiers and licensing costs for integrating it into our lab’s data collection.

contents.text: For technical support and existing account assistance, press 2.
For technical support and to report a bug, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing a crash in my app and need to report the bug for urgent help.
I’m encountering critical crashes in my application and need to report a bug to Sentry’s technical support team.
I want to report a missing error aggregation for our React Native app in Sentry.
I’m having an issue with the app and need to report a bug.
Report a technical issue: the Sentry Python SDK crashes when logging sensor data in my experiment.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account management and billing team.

navigationGoals: I need assistance resolving an issue with my account’s billing and invoice.
I want to update my account billing information, review my subscription details, and confirm any veteran discounts on my plan.
I need to update our credit card on file and review the last invoice for our Pro plan.
I have a charge on my account I don’t recognize and need billing assistance.
Update billing information and payment method for my existing Sentry subscription used in my research group.
